welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Accrington! A charming town known for its rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore our beautiful city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of international destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a wide range of shops, restaurants, and lounges for travelers to enjoy.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used by low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Limited free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with the option to purchase premium WiFi for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
